CustomField.description: Child logs capture details for discrete events during the lifecycle of a batch job. When the job started, success or failure of its executions, and when the job finished. Parent logs groups these child logs together for a given batch job id, and reflect the overall job status.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Child logs capture details for discrete events during the lifecycle of a batch job. Parent logs groups these child logs together for a given batch job id.
CustomField.label: Parent Log
